title: Bring your creative ideas to life

tagline: Bring your creative ideas to life with our AI image generator
noLogin: No login required to start creating
prompt_hint: Enter your prompt in English for the best results

ultimate_description: High-Quality image generation produces more detailed and sharper images.
ultimate_unlock: Upgrade to Ultimate to unlock High-Quality image generation for significantly improved details.
ultimate_advantage1: Significant improvement in image quality and detail
feature1_description: Authentic reconstruction of portrait textures and ultimate alignment of emotional expression.
feature2_description: Precise response to font size, typeface, and weight, empowering professional graphic layouts.
feature3_description: Supports 2K output, significantly improving image clarity and structural accuracy.
feature4_description: Enhanced semantic understanding and cinematic quality, making images more narrative.
features_subtitle: Experience the next generation of AI image generation - powerful, free, and privacy-focused.
feature_creation_desc: The world's first AI platform to offer free multi-model image generation, including exclusive access to secret image styles with Seedream3.0.
feature_quality_desc: Powered by the FLUX family and the world's top text-to-image model, Seedream3.0, delivering photorealistic images with exceptional detail and artistic control.
feature_text_desc: Superior text-to-image capabilities with accurate interpretation of complex prompts and text overlay features.
feature_speed_desc: Optimized inference process ensures rapid image generation without compromising on quality.
feature_privacy_desc: Zero data retention policy - your prompts and generated images are never stored on our servers.
feature_style_desc: Create images in a wide variety of artistic styles, from photorealism to anime, oil painting to digital art.
faq_subtitle: Find the answers to your questions here.
faq1_question: What is DreamImg AI and how does it work?
faq1_answer: DreamImg AI is the world's first free multi-model AI image generator, powered by the FLUX family and the top-ranked Seedream3.0 model. It allows you to create high-quality images by simply entering text prompts, without any registration or usage limits.
faq2_question: Is DreamImg AI really free to use?
faq2_answer: Yes, DreamImg AI offers free use of multiple models! It also supports the generation of exclusive secret images through the top-tier Seedream3.0 model. We are committed to becoming the world's most valuable AI image generator for both commercial and entertainment purposes.
faq3_question: What makes DreamImg AI different from other AI image generators?
faq3_answer: DreamImg AI is the first AI platform to offer the entire FLUX family of models for free and the first to generate secret images with Seedream3.0. We provide superior image quality, fast generation speeds, and complete privacy protection, with exclusive copyright to your generated images.
faq4_question: What are the differences between using the FLUX family and Seedream3.0 on DreamImg AI?
faq4_answer: Seedream3.0 specializes in realistic portrait textures, powerful text responses, high-definition output, and cinematic quality enhancements. The FLUX family of models excels at understanding complex prompts and generating diverse visual styles.
faq5_question: What kind of images can I create with DreamImg AI?
faq5_answer: You can create a wide variety of images, including photorealistic scenes, promotional materials, artistic illustrations, movie posters, digital art, anime-style images, and more. The FLUX models are great for diverse styles, while Seedream3.0 can help you create exclusive, high-fashion-like images.
faq6_question: How does DreamImg AI protect my privacy?
faq6_answer: We take privacy very seriously. We do not store your prompts or generated images on our servers and do not require any personal information. Your creations are completely private and deleted after generation.
my_works_description: Here you can see all the images you have generated.
generator.negative_prompt_placeholder: What to avoid in the image? (e.g., ugly, deformed, extra fingers)
generator.upgrade_required_for_model: You need to upgrade to the Ultimate plan to use this model.
pricing_subtitle: Get the best of Raphael AI with faster generation and commercial use.
pricing_faq_subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our subscription plans.
pricing_faq1_a: Your support helps us keep this site running for free, and comes with some great perks! Your images will be watermark-free; generations will be faster; your images will be completely private and not shared in our public gallery or for recommendations; and you will not see any ads!
pricing_faq2_a: Anytime! You can upgrade or cancel with one click from your account settings page. Your subscription will last until the end of the subscription period with absolutely no strings attached.
pricing_faq3_a: No, all of our sales are final and non-refundable.
pricing_faq4_a: Maybe... While we work hard to keep our plans affordable, we are adding more features and building more powerful models. However, we are happy to honor our commitment if you purchase a yearly plan.
pricing_faq5_q: Do I get higher quality images if I subscribe?
pricing_faq5_a: Yes! The Ultimate plan offers exclusive access to High-Definition (HD) image generation, which significantly improves detail, clarity, and resolution. When combined with our 'Optimize Image' feature, Ultimate users get the absolute best quality.
pricing_faq6_q: Will I still get the 'too much traffic' message if I subscribe?
pricing_faq6_a: Under normal use, you should not encounter this message. However, if our systems detect unusual usage patterns (e.g., reverse engineering attempts or other unauthorized methods), you may still see this message.
pricing_faq7_q: Can I get help with the product?
pricing_faq7_a: Yes! You can always email us at support@raphael.ai for any help you need.
pricing_faq8_a: If you have unique needs and would like to learn more about pricing, please contact us at sales@raphael.ai.
pricing_faq9_q: Do I have to be a subscriber to use the images for commercial use?
pricing_faq9_a: No, as long as you adhere to the Terms of Use, you can use our images for personal, academic, or commercial use as you see fit! Please credit Raphael AI as the source if you are a free subscriber.
pricing_faq10_q: Does my subscription include API access?
pricing_faq10_a: No, we do not currently have a public API, but it will be coming in the near future. We would be happy to hear about your specific requirements.
negative_prompt_placeholder: What do you want to avoid?
